title: 820-00928 - short on component not shown in boardview
message: Have this board with Touch Bar issues. Found the short but the boardview for this board doesn’t seem to match this version. Anyone have an idea what other components these are ties to as I’ve removed both capacitors and a third on the other side of the board and the short is still there. See picture of the capacitors in question and also what boardview is showing me.

title: 820-00928 - short on component not shown in boardview
message: I do not know what those caps are for, but I do know that they are supposed to be like that. I have tested them on a board that works 100% and its still shows both sides of those caps as ground, so that should not be causing your issue.

title: 820-00928 - short on component not shown in boardview
message: Awesome. There were two other caps that I found that were shorted. I just got side tracked by those when I was wrapping up. Never even got to test it. Guess I should have tested my work before going down this rabbits trail. Thanks for the info.
